item.title: Mail alerts module - BO header buttons
item.description: Mail alerts module - BO header buttons Details Component : ps_emailalerts Status : [TEST] To be automated Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-4147 Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Modules > Module manager and search ps_emailalerts The module page list should be displayed and Mail alerts module should be displayed on the list Click on “Configure” button at the right of the module * The “Configure” page is displayed
